name: Abiding
description: Weapons with this enchant become unbreakable

name: Aegis
description: Chance to gain speed when taking fall damage.

name: Allure
description: Your attack pulls mobs towards you.

name: Ambit
description:
Damages mobs within a radius
that increases with the level of enchant.

name: Angelic
description: Heals when damaged.

name: Aqua
description: Deal double damage while in water.

name: Aquatic
description: Breathe underwater.

name: Archer
description: Increases damage dealt with bows.

name: Armored
description:
Decreases damage from enemy
swords by 2% per level.

name: Arrow Break
description:
Chance for arrows to bounce off you
while holding item with this enchant.

name: Arrow Deflect
description: Chance to prevent enemy arrow from dealing damage.

name: Auto Reel
description: Automatically reels in the fishing rod when it gets a bite.

name: Axe of Spirits
description:
Chance to get more souls
from killing players.

name: Bait
description: Chance to receive double fishing drops.

name: Barbarian
description: Chance to inflicts more axe damage.

name: Beastslayer
description: Increases damage dealt to Hostile Mobs.

name: Berserk
description:
Chance of strength
and mining fatigue.

name: Blacksmith
description:
Repair your weapon in exchange
for dealing less damage.

name: Bleed
description: Make your opponent bleed.

name: Blind
description:
A chance of causing blindness
when attacking.

name: Block
description:
A chance to negate an attack
and deal up to 4 damage back.

name: Blunt Force
description: Chance to strike with great force.

name: Bone Crusher
description: Increases damage dealt to Skeletons.

name: Bowmaster
description:
Multiplies damage against players who are
wielding a Sword at the time they are hit.

name: Call to Allies
description:
Call your allies to your aid
if you are in danger.

name: Carrot Planter
description:
Plant carrots in a 3x3 area
by shift+right-clicking.

name: Chaos
description: Deal weakness and wither effects.

name: Chunky
description: Chance to receive less damage.

name: Cleave
description:
Damages players within a radius
that increases with the level of enchant.

name: Confuse
description: Chance to give nausea effect.

name: Convulse
description:
Chance to throw your
attackers into the air.

name: Creeper Armor
description:
Chance to be immune to explosive damage, at
higher levels you have a chance to heal.

name: Critical
description: Increase damage done with critical hit.

name: Curse
description: Chance to give your enemy mining fatigue.

name: Deadshot
description:
Headshots with tridents
deal double damage.

name: Death Punch
description: Increases damage dealt to Zombies.

name: Decapitation
description:
Chance to have opponents
head drop on death.

name: Deranged
description: Strike lightning at nearby players.

name: Devour
description: Chance to restore food while killing mobs.

name: Diminish
description: Chance to give your enemy mining fatigue.

name: Diploid
description:
Chance to multiply mob drops.
Costs 5 souls / activation.

name: Disappear
description:
Chance to become invisible when
low on health.

name: Disarm
description: Chance to disarm opponent.

name: Disarmor
description:
Chance of unequipping random
armor piece from your opponent.

name: Disintegrate
description:
Chance to deal extra durability damage to
all enemy armor with every attack.

name: Distance
description:
Chance to distance yourself from your enemies
and gain regeneration.

name: Divert
description:
Chance of poisoning opponent and
gaining regeneration.

name: Dodge
description:
Chance to dodge physical enemy,
chance increases when sneaking.

name: Double Strike
description: A chance to strike twice.

name: Ender Slayer
description: Increases damage dealt to Enderman and Ender dragons.

name: Endmaster
description: Double damage to mobs in End.

name: Epicness
description: Gives particles and sound effects.

name: Exalted
description:
A chance of removing
bad potion effects.

name: Experience
description: Chance to get more experience from ores.

name: Explosive
description: Chance for arrows to explode.

name: Explosive Demise
description:
Summon creepers as your guards
when near death.

name: Extinguish
description:
Chance to extinguish yourself
when on fire.

name: Famine
description: A chance to give your opponent the hunger effect.

name: Featherweight
description: Chance to get a burst of haste.

name: Fire Hook
description: The hook is on fire.

name: Forcefield
description: Chance to push away your opponent.

name: Frenzy
description: Chance for arrows to explode.

name: Frozen
description:
Can cause slowness to attacker
when defending.

name: Fuddle
description: Disorganize opponent's hotbar.

name: Fumble
description:
Chance to explode enemy
when hit by their arrows.

name: Gears
description: Added speed when equipped.

name: Gemify
description: Chance for an ore block to turn into it's block

name: Glowing
description: Gives permanent night vision.

name: Greatsword
description:
Multiplies damage against players who are
wielding a Bow at the time they are hit.

name: Guardians
description:
A chance to spawn iron golems to
assist you and watch over you.

name: Hardened
description: Chance to recover durability when damaged by players.

name: Harvest
description: Chance to harvest in 3x3 area.

name: Haste
description: Allows you to swing your tools faster.

name: Hasten
description: Chance to gain Haste after breaking blocks.

name: Heavy
description:
Decreases damage from enemy bows
by 2% per level.

name: Hellfire
description: Arrows turn into fireballs.

name: Hook
description: Get more exp from fishing.

name: Hunter
description: Increases damage dealt to Passive Mobs.

name: Ice Aspect
description:
A chance of causing the slowness
effect on your enemy.

name: Immolate
description: Increases damage dealt to Spiders.

name: Immolation
description: Set all mobs in radius on fire.

name: Immortal
description:
Chance to prevents your armor
from taking durability damage.

name: Impact
description: Chance to double dealt damage.

name: Implants
description: Chance to restore food every few seconds.

name: Infernal
description: Explosive fire effect.

name: Inflame
description: Set all players in radius on fire.

name: Inquisitive
description: Chance to increase EXP drops from mobs.

name: Interrupt
description: Chance to give your enemy mining fatigue.

name: Jelly Legs
description: Chance to negate fall damage.

name: Judgement
description:
Chance of poisoning opponent and
gaining regeneration.

name: Kill Aura
description:
Chance to kill multiple
monsters in radius.

name: Launch
description: Launch yourself by right-clicking.

name: Lava Walker
description: Walk on Lava.

name: Lifesteal
description:
A chance to steal health
when attacking.

name: Longbow
description:
Greatly increases damage dealt
to enemy players that have
a bow in their hands.

name: Lucid
description:
Chance to cure blindness and
gain night vision when hit.

name: Lucky
description: Chance to increase luck while fishing.

name: Magnet
description: Your attack pulls players towards you.

name: Marksman
description: Increases damage dealt with Crossbows.

name: Missile
description: Arrows turn into fireballs.

name: Molten
description: Chance of setting your attacker ablaze.

name: Momentum
description:
Chance to gain speed boost
with fireworks.

name: Multiplication
description:
Chance to multiply ore drops.
Costs 5 souls / activation.

name: Nether Slayer
description: Increases damage dealt to nether mobs.

name: Netherling
description: Double damage to mobs in Nether.

name: Neutralize
description: Chance to disarm opponent.

name: Night Owl
description: Deal more damage to mobs at night.

name: Nightwalker
description: Freeze mobs at night.

name: Nulify
description:
Chance to deal double damage
while leaving enemy blind.
Costs 40 souls / activation.

name: Obsidianshield
description: Gives permanent fire resistance.

name: Overload
description: Unlocks additional hearts.

name: Paralyze
description:
Gives lightning effect and a chance
for slowness and slow swinging.

name: Patch
description: Chance to recover durability when damaged by mobs.

name: Perish
description: A chance to give the wither effect.

name: Permafrost
description: Chance slow and bleed opponents.

name: Phoenix
description: Chance to revive yourself when killed.

name: Piercing
description: Inflicts more damage.

name: Planter
description:
Plant seeds in a 3x3 area
by shift+right-clicking.

name: Plummet
description:
Deal damage to nearby mobs
when taking fall damage.

name: Poison
description: A chance of giving poison effect.

name: Poisoned
description: Chance to give poison to your attacker.

name: Poisoned Hook
description: Poisons the hook.

name: Poseidon
description: Increases damage dealt with Tridents.

name: Potato Planter
description:
Plant potatoes in a 3x3 area
by shift+right-clicking.

name: Ragdoll
description:
Chance to be pushed
back when getting hit.

name: Ravenous
description:
Chance to regain hunger
while fighting.

name: Reaper
description:
A chance to give your opponent the
Wither and Blindness effects
while dealing damage

name: Rebound
description: Gain some health back after kills.

name: Rebreather
description:
Chance to regain air
when mining under water.

name: Reflect
description:
Absorb enemy damage and
reflect it back.

name: Reforged
description:
Protects weapons and tools durability, items will be take
longer to break.

name: Reinforced
description: Reduces damage dealt to you.

name: Replanter
description: Replants crops when you break them.

name: Replenish
description: Chance to restore food while mining.

name: Restore
description:
Upon breaking, item has a chance
to lose this enchantment and repair
half of its durability.

name: Rocket Escape
description: Blast off into the air at low HP.

name: Rush
description:
Chance of speed boost when
taking off with elytra.
Costs 10 souls / activation.

name: Safeguard
description:
Chance to gain Damage Resistance
when defending.

name: Scare
description:
Chance to replace your opponents helmet
to a pumpkin for a short time.

name: Sharpness Hook
description: Deal damage with the hook.

name: Shatter
description:
Chance to deal extra durability damage to
all enemy armor with every attack.

name: Shockwave
description:
Chance to push back your attacker
when your health is low.

name: Slayer
description: Increases damage dealt to Passive Mobs.

name: Slingshot
description: Boost yourself into flight by right-clicking.

name: Smelting
description: Chance to smelt mined blocks.

name: Smoke Bomb
description:
When you are near death, you
will spawn a smoke bomb to
distract your enemies.

name: Snap
description: Pull hit entity towards you.

name: Snare
description:
Chance to slow and fatigue
enemies with projectiles.

name: Sniper
description:
Headshots with bows
deal double damage.

name: Soulbound
description: A chance to keep item on death.

name: Soulgrind
description: Chance to get souls by killing mobs.

name: Soulless
description: Increases damage dealt to Hostile Mobs.

name: Soulminer
description: Chance to get souls by mining.

name: Spark
description: Light opponents on fire.

name: Spiritmaster
description:
Chance to get more souls
from killing players.

name: Spirits
description: Chance to spawn guard blazes.

name: Springs
description: Gives jump boost.

name: Strife
description: Increases Trident melee damage.

name: Strike
description:
Chance to strike lightning
at the opponent.

name: Striker
description: Rain arrows over opponent.

name: Suspend
description: Chance to cause no knockback to mobs.

name: Swordsman
description:
Chance to reduces incoming damage while
wielding a sword by up to 22% at max level.

name: Tank
description:
Chance to decreases damage from enemy
axes by 2% per level.

name: Telepathy
description:
Automatically places blocks broken
by tools in your inventory.

name: Thunderlord
description:
Strike monsters with lightning
every 3 consecutive hits.

name: Timber
description: Chance to break a tree in one hit

name: Trench
description: Chance to break in 3x3 area.

name: Trickster
description:
When hit you have a
chance to teleport directly
behind you opponent.

name: Tunnel
description:
Chance to dig tunnels and staircases 
in the direction you're facing.

name: Turmoil
description:
Chance to prevent opponents
guards from spawning.

name: Twinge
description:
Make your enemy bleed, if
hit using melee attack.

name: Unbreakable
description: Tools with this enchant become unbreakable

name: Undead Ruse
description:
When hit you have a chance to spawn zombie
hordes to distract and disorient your opponents.

name: Unholy
description: Defend with weakness and wither effects.

name: Vampire
description:
A chance to heal you for up to
3hp a few seconds after you strike.

name: Vein Miner
description: Mine entire vein of ores

name: Virus
description: A chance of giving poison effect.

name: Voodoo
description: Gives a chance to deal weakness.

name: Ward
description: A chance to absorb enemy damage

name: Water Walker
description: Walk on Water.

name: Wings
description: Allows flying when worn.

name: Wither
description: A chance to give the wither effect.
